Package com.cis.gorecipe.controller

Class FoodImageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cis.gorecipe.controller.FoodImageController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/images")
public class FoodImageController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the API endpoints related to uploading images of ingredients and the processing of those images

      • uploadImage

        @PostMapping(path="/upload/{userId}",
             consumes="multipart/form-data")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Ingredient>> uploadImage​(@RequestPart("image")
                                                                                       org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image,
                                                                                       @PathVariable("userId")
                                                                                       java.lang.Long userId)
                                                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        image - a JPEG image
        userId - the ID of the user who uploaded the image
        Returns:
        the ingredient that GoRecipe has determined to be in the image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
